short_summary: Parks Canada Agency, Pukaskwa National Park, requires the supply and delivery of one custom fabricated complete garbage trailer.
description: The trailer will be used in a campground to allow workers to collect garbage from the campsites and to store garbage for up to one week.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Notice Reference
WS4108333589 - Doc4110538051

#### Solicitation Number
WS4108333589

#### Tender Closing Date
Friday, September 8th, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time

#### Amendment Date
August 21st, 2023

#### Authority
Contracting Entity:
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

End-User Entity:
Parks Canada Agency
Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

#### Contract Description
Parks Canada Agency, Pukaskwa National Park, invites bids for the supply and delivery of one custom fabricated complete garbage trailer. The trailer will be used in a campground to collect garbage from campsites and store waste for up to a week.

#### Key Mandatory Technical Criteria

To be considered responsive, bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each of the mandatory technical criteria outlined in the RFP. Failure to provide evidence of compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.

#### Amendments
**During Publishing of the Tender:** 
All required supporting documentation and the bid submission must be submitted on September 8, 2023 before 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after this date and time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Solicitation Deadline Modification:
Please disregard the designated response deadline closing time in the Ariba Discovery posting. 

#### Pre-Qualification Requirements
Pre-qualification of bidders will not be conducted. Suppliers who choose to submit their bid are expected to meet the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The following criteria will be used to evaluate bids:

The procurement will be awarded to the bidder who offers the lowest price, subject to fulfilling all requirements specified in the RFP.
#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Notice Pre-Qualification Process

Only bidders who submit a bid will be invited to participate in practical and financial evaluation. The contact information for inquiries or submissions is noted below.

#### Contact

Harvey, Christopher (SPAC/PSPC)

christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(519) 671-2396

The bidding process will follow the open competition procedures as prescribed in the Supply Manual. If you wish to
